variable.name: OD_VA1
variable.description: VISUAL ACUITY WITH "WALK-IN" CORRECTION, BY REFRACTOMETER IF POSSIBLE FIRST PART OF FORMULA: OD_VA1/OD_VA2 + OD_VA3, FINGER COUNTING = 9/400+0, HAND MOTION = 8/400+0, LIGHT PERCEPTION = 7/400+0, NO LIGHT PERCEPTION = 2/400+0

variable.name: OD_VA2
variable.description: VISUAL ACUITY WITH "WALK-IN" CORRECTION, BY REFRACTOMETER IF POSSIBLE SECOND PART OF FORMULA: OD_VA1/OD_VA2 + OD_VA3, FINGER COUNTING = 9/400+0, HAND MOTION = 8/400+0, LIGHT PERCEPTION = 7/400+0, NO LIGHT PERCEPTION = 2/400+0

variable.name: OD_VA3
variable.description: VISUAL ACUITY WITH "WALK-IN" CORRECTION, BY REFRACTOMETER IF POSSIBLE THIRD PART OF FORMULA: OD_VA1/OD_VA2 + OD_VA3, FINGER COUNTING = 9/400+0, HAND MOTION = 8/400+0, LIGHT PERCEPTION = 7/400+0, NO LIGHT PERCEPTION = 2/400+0

variable.name: OS_VA1
variable.description: VISUAL ACUITY WITH "WALK-IN" CORRECTION, BY REFRACTOMETER IF POSSIBLE FIRST PART OF FORMULA: OS_VA1/OS_VA2 + OS_VA3, FINGER COUNTING = 9/400+0, HAND MOTION = 8/400+0, LIGHT PERCEPTION = 7/400+0, NO LIGHT PERCEPTION = 2/400+0

variable.name: OS_VA2
variable.description: VISUAL ACUITY WITH "WALK-IN" CORRECTION, BY REFRACTOMETER IF POSSIBLE SECOND PART OF FORMULA: OS_VA1/OS_VA2 + OS_VA3, FINGER COUNTING = 9/400+0, HAND MOTION = 8/400+0, LIGHT PERCEPTION = 7/400+0, NO LIGHT PERCEPTION = 2/400+0

variable.name: OS_VA3
variable.description: VISUAL ACUITY WITH "WALK-IN" CORRECTION, BY REFRACTOMETER IF POSSIBLE THIRD PART OF FORMULA: OS_VA1/OS_VA2 + OS_VA3, FINGER COUNTING = 9/400+0, HAND MOTION = 8/400+0, LIGHT PERCEPTION = 7/400+0, NO LIGHT PERCEPTION = 2/400+0

variable.name: OD_DB
variable.description: VISUAL ACUITY DONE BY, O.D.

variable.name: OS_DB
variable.description: VISUAL ACUITY DONE BY, 0.S.

variable.name: OD_WIC
variable.description: VISUAL ACUITY "WALK-IN" CORRECTION, O.D.

variable.name: OS_WIC
variable.description: VISUAL ACUITY "WALK-IN" CORRECTION, O.S.

variable.name: OD_RESP
variable.description: REFRACTIVE ERROR, BY REFRACTOMETER IF POSSIBLE: SPHERE, O.D. (USE TRIAL LENSES IF REFRACTOMETER CANNOT BE DONE OR IF UNRELIABLE FOR THIS SUBJECT)

variable.name: OD_RECYL
variable.description: REFRACTIVE ERROR, BY REFRACTOMETER IF POSSIBLE: CYLINDER, O.D. (USE TRIAL LENSES IF REFRACTOMETER CANNOT BE DONE OR IF UNRELIABLE FOR THIS SUBJECT)

variable.name: OD_REAXI
variable.description: REFRACTIVE ERROR, BY REFRACTOMETER IF POSSIBLE: AXIS, O.D. (USE TRIAL LENSES IF REFRACTOMETER CANNOT BE DONE OR IF UNRELIABLE FOR THIS SUBJECT)

variable.name: OS_RESP
variable.description: REFRACTIVE ERROR, BY REFRACTOMETER IF POSSIBLE: SPHERE, O.S. (USE TRIAL LENSES IF REFRACTOMETER CANNOT BE DONE OR IF UNRELIABLE FOR THIS SUBJECT)

variable.name: REDB
variable.description: REFRACTIVE ERROR DONE BY

variable.name: OD_BCVA1
variable.description: BEST CORRECTED VISUAL ACUITY (AFTER REFRACTION), O.D. FIRST PART OF FORMULA: OD_BCVA1/OD_BCVA2 + OD_BCVA3, FINGER COUNTING = 9/400+0, HAND MOTION = 8/400+0, LIGHT PERCEPTION = 7/400+0, NO LIGHT PERCEPTION = 2/400+0

variable.name: OD_BCVA2
variable.description: BEST CORRECTED VISUAL ACUITY (AFTER REFRACTION), O.D. SECOND PART OF FORMULA: OD_BCVA1/OD_BCVA2 + OD_BCVA3, FINGER COUNTING = 9/400+0, HAND MOTION = 8/400+0, LIGHT PERCEPTION = 7/400+0, NO LIGHT PERCEPTION = 2/400+0

variable.name: OD_BCVA3

variable.name: OS_BCVA1

variable.name: OS_BCVA2
